Protocols/LayoutSizable.html.name: LayoutSizable
Protocols/LayoutSizable.html.abstract: Represents any view or view controller that knows how to size itself

Extensions/UINavigationController.html#/.name: layoutSize
Extensions/UINavigationController.html#/.abstract: For navigation controller the ideal layout size is that of its child controller combined

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: layoutSize
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: A view controller’s layout size is that of its view

Extensions/Animation.html#/s:7YCoreUI9An.name: defaultPresent
Extensions/Animation.html#/s:7YCoreUI9An.abstract: Default animation for presenting a bottom sheet

Extensions/Animation.html#/s:7YCoreUI9An.name: defaultDismiss
Extensions/Animation.html#/s:7YCoreUI9An.abstract: Default animation for dismissing a bottom sheet

Classes/SheetHeaderView/Appearance/Layou.name: contentInset
Classes/SheetHeaderView/Appearance/Layou.abstract: The custom distance the content inset from the HeaderView.

Classes/SheetHeaderView/Appearance/Layou.name: gap
Classes/SheetHeaderView/Appearance/Layou.abstract: The minimum required horizontal spacing between title label and message label. Default is 8.0.

Classes/SheetHeaderView/Appearance.html#.name: title
Classes/SheetHeaderView/Appearance.html#.abstract: A tuple consisting of textColor and typography for the title label.

Classes/SheetHeaderView/Appearance.html#.name: closeButtonImage
Classes/SheetHeaderView/Appearance.html#.abstract: Close button image. Default is SF symbol xmark.

Classes/SheetHeaderView/Appearance.html#.name: layout
Classes/SheetHeaderView/Appearance.html#.abstract: Header view layout properties such as spacing between views. Default is .default.

Classes/SheetHeaderView/Appearance/Layou.name: Layout
Classes/SheetHeaderView/Appearance/Layou.abstract: A collection of layout properties for the SheetHeaderView.

Classes/SheetHeaderView.html#/s:12YBotto.name: appearance
Classes/SheetHeaderView.html#/s:12YBotto.abstract: Appearance for the sheet header (title text and close button).

Classes/SheetHeaderView.html#/s:12YBotto.name: closeButton
Classes/SheetHeaderView.html#/s:12YBotto.abstract: Close button to dismiss the bottom sheet.

Classes/SheetHeaderView/Appearance.html.name: Appearance
Classes/SheetHeaderView/Appearance.html.abstract: Determines the appearance of the sheet header view of a bottom sheet.

Classes/DragIndicatorView/Appearance/Lay.name: cornerRadius
Classes/DragIndicatorView/Appearance/Lay.abstract: Corner radius of drag indicator. Default is 2.0.

Classes/DragIndicatorView/Appearance/Lay.name: size
Classes/DragIndicatorView/Appearance/Lay.abstract: Size for the drag indicator. Default is {60, 4}.

Classes/DragIndicatorView/Appearance/Lay.name: topInset
Classes/DragIndicatorView/Appearance/Lay.abstract: Inset of indicator from top of sheet. Default is 8.0

Classes/DragIndicatorView/Appearance.htm.name: layout
Classes/DragIndicatorView/Appearance.htm.abstract: Drag indicator view layout properties such as size, corner radius. Default is .default.

Classes/DragIndicatorView/Appearance/Lay.name: Layout
Classes/DragIndicatorView/Appearance/Lay.abstract: A collection of layout properties for the DragIndicatorView.

Classes/DragIndicatorView.html#/s:12YBot.name: appearance
Classes/DragIndicatorView.html#/s:12YBot.abstract: Appearance for the drag indicator (color and layout).

Classes/DragIndicatorView.html#/c:@M@YBo.name: intrinsicContentSize
Classes/DragIndicatorView.html#/c:@M@YBo.abstract: Returns the size of the drag handle.

Classes/DragIndicatorView/Appearance.htm.name: Appearance
Classes/DragIndicatorView/Appearance.htm.abstract: Determines the appearance of the drag indicator handle of a bottom sheet.

Classes/BottomSheetController/Appearance.name: cornerRadius
Classes/BottomSheetController/Appearance.abstract: Corner radius of bottom sheet view. Default is 16.

Classes/BottomSheetController/Appearance.name: minimumTopOffset
Classes/BottomSheetController/Appearance.abstract: Minimum top offset of sheet from safe area top. Default is 44.

Classes/BottomSheetController/Appearance.name: indicatorAppearance
Classes/BottomSheetController/Appearance.abstract: Appearance of the drag indicator. Default is nil (non-resizable sheet).

Classes/BottomSheetController/Appearance.name: headerAppearance
Classes/BottomSheetController/Appearance.abstract: Appearance of the sheet header view. Default is .default.

Classes/BottomSheetController/Appearance.name: layout
Classes/BottomSheetController/Appearance.abstract: Bottom sheet layout properties such as corner radius. Default is .default.

Classes/BottomSheetController/Appearance.name: presentAnimation
Classes/BottomSheetController/Appearance.abstract: Animation for presenting the bottom sheet. Default = .defaultPresent.

Classes/BottomSheetController/Appearance.name: dismissAnimation
Classes/BottomSheetController/Appearance.abstract: Animation for dismissing the bottom sheet. Default = .defaultDismiss.

Classes/BottomSheetController/Appearance.name: isDismissAllowed
Classes/BottomSheetController/Appearance.abstract: The user can always dismiss the sheet from the close button if it is visible.

Classes/BottomSheetController/Appearance.name: Layout
Classes/BottomSheetController/Appearance.abstract: A collection of layout properties for the BottomSheetController.

Classes/BottomSheetController.html#/s:12.name: dismissThresholdVelocity
Classes/BottomSheetController.html#/s:12.abstract: Minimum downward velocity beyond which we interpret a pan gesture as a downward swipe.

Classes/BottomSheetController.html#/s:12.name: isResizable
Classes/BottomSheetController.html#/s:12.abstract: Whether the sheet is resizable or not.

Classes/BottomSheetController.html#/c:@M.name: accessibilityPerformEscape()
Classes/BottomSheetController.html#/c:@M.abstract: Performing the accessibility escape gesture dismisses the bottom sheet.

Classes/BottomSheetController.html#/c:@C.name: animationController(forPresented:presenting:source:)
Classes/BottomSheetController.html#/c:@C.abstract: Returns the animator for presenting a bottom sheet

Classes/BottomSheetController.html#/c:@C.name: animationController(forDismissed:)
Classes/BottomSheetController.html#/c:@C.abstract: Returns the animator for dismissing a bottom sheet

Classes/BottomSheetController/Appearance.name: Appearance
Classes/BottomSheetController/Appearance.abstract: Determines the appearance of the bottom sheet.

Classes/BottomSheetController.html.name: BottomSheetController
Classes/BottomSheetController.html.abstract: A view controller that manages a bottom sheet.

Classes/DragIndicatorView.html.name: DragIndicatorView
Classes/DragIndicatorView.html.abstract: Drag handle indicator for a bottom sheet.

Classes/SheetHeaderView.html.name: SheetHeaderView
Classes/SheetHeaderView.html.abstract: Header view for a bottom sheet to show optional title and optional close button.
